interface/ProgressMarker.h

00001 #if !defined(STOR_PROGRESSMARKER_H)
00002 #define STOR_PROGRESSMARKER_H
00003 
00004 // Created by Markus Klute on 2007 Jan 09.
00005 // $Id: ProgressMarker.h,v 1.1 2007/02/05 11:19:56 klute Exp $
00006 
00007 // singleton class 
00008 // to return the status of the StorageManager
00009 // with std::string status()
00010 
00011 // used for monitoring only, the status is implemented 
00012 // in the following way
00013 //
00014 // thread/status
00015 // ----------------------------
00016 // read     oox  xx   o    o
00017 // process  xxx  oo   o    o
00018 // write    oxx  ox   x    o
00019 // ----------------------------
00020 // result   proc inpu outp idle
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 
00024 namespace stor 
00025 {
00026   class ProgressMarker
00027     {
00028     public:
00029       static ProgressMarker *instance();
00030       static void instance(ProgressMarker *);    
00031       std::string status();
00032 
00033       void reading(bool b)    {reading_    = b;}
00034       void writing(bool b)    {writing_    = b;}
00035       void processing(bool b) {processing_ = b;}      
00036       
00037       std::string idle()    { return "Idle";}
00038       std::string input()   { return "Input";} 
00039       std::string process() { return "Process";}
00040       std::string output()  { return "Output"; }
00041 
00042     private:
00043       ProgressMarker();
00044       
00045       bool reading_;
00046       bool writing_;
00047       bool processing_;
00048     }; 
00049 }
00050 
00051 #endif
00052
